about_the_game:
Turn up the volume and rock the farm with the Bok 'n' Roll Supporter Pack! This special DLC is for players who want to show their support for Shotgun Farmers while looking (and sounding) like a true rock star. Packed with electrifying cosmetics, a new stage-worthy lobby background, and exclusive in-game titles, this pack is all about bringing the energy of a live concert straight to the battlefield.

What’s Included? 🎸🎤

  • Cob 'n' Roll Shotgun Skin – Your shotgun transformed into an electric guitar.

  • Rockin' Spade Shovel Skin – Drop beats with your microphone shovel.

  • Bok Star Player Skins – Dress up in headliner-worthy outfits and own the stage.

  • Legendary Hat & Eyewear – Complete the rockstar look with stylish accessories.

  • Stageside Lobby – A brand-new lobby backdrop to set the tone before your next match.

  • Exclusive Badges & Titles – Show off your support with exclusive rock-themed badges.

  • Free Bok Lobby Track – Rock out in the lobby with this new track.

  • Our eternal love and gratitude for your support ♥️

Thank you for keeping the music (and mayhem) alive! 🤘🌽

NOTE: All items in this pack are purely cosmetic—no pay-to-win here, just a way to crank up your style while helping support the future of Shotgun Farmers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

supported_languages: English, French, German, Dutch, Japanese, Russian, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Swedish
